refnamediv.refpurpose: Convert and sync your MicroMoney account data Quicken QIF format.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: money2qif is used to convert and sync your MicroMoney account data Quicken QIF format.
Please see http://www.techstop.com.my/MicroMoney.htm for more information on MicroMoney.
NOTE: MicroMoney is no longer supported or supplied by Landware, and has been superceded by PocketQuicken. There is no PocketQuicken conduit in pilot-link.

blockquote.para: The name of the Account category in MicroMoney.

Use device file <port> to communicate with the Palm handheld. If this is not specified, install-expenses will look for the $PILOTPORT environment variable. If neither are found or supplied, install-expenses will print the usage information.
Display the copyright information,version number, licence details and build details and exit without connecting.
Show the help message and exit without connecting.
Display a brief usage message and exit without connecting.

refsect1.title: Author
refsect1.para: money2qif was written by Rui Oliveira and Kenneth Albanowski.
This manual page was written by Neil Williams linux@codehelp.co.uk
